product_name: Brooks PureFlow 2 Road-Running Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Combining lightweight construction and lush cushioning, the Brooks PureFlow 2 Road-Running Shoes give you a minimalist feel and amazing comfort to keep feet happy mile after mile. Lightweight uppers feature highly breathable polyester mesh with synthetic leather overlays to provide a foot-hugging fit. Wide rubber instep band offers the foot arch support without bulk. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Split toe groove under the forefoot enhances forefoot flexibility and lets the toes function independently for better balance. Center strike pods provide guidance in finding the natural landing zone. Midsoles feature BioMoGo polymer alloy foam, which provides cushioning, energy return and reduced foot fatigue; nontoxic additive helps midsoles break down in landfill. Low-profile rubber outsoles grip well on the road, sidewalk and gentle trails. Designed on an anatomical last, Brooks PureFlow 2 Road-Running Shoes contour to the feet, providing a glovelike fit. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Combining lightweight construction and lush cushioning, the Brooks PureFlow 2 Road-Running Shoes give you a minimalist feel and amazing comfort to keep feet happy mile after mile.
